data.lyric:
[ti:Hallelujah]
[ar:Carrie Underwood/John Legend]
[al:My Gift]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hallelujah - Carrie Underwood (凯莉·安德伍德)/John Legend (约翰·传奇)
[00:05.62]Lyrics by：John Stephens/Toby Gad
[00:11.25]Composed by：John Stephens/Toby Gad
[00:16.87]Ooh in the winter's chill
[00:23.84]Let the candles light the night up from the windowsills
[00:33.10]Ooh as I draw you near
[00:40.12]And we whisper all the sweet sounds only we can hear
[00:49.32]On the coldest evening in this December
[00:57.25]I hold you in the heat of the glowing embers
[01:04.84]Let the world stand still the church bells ring
[01:09.30]Silent night as the angels sing
[01:13.04]Hallelujah Hallelujah
[01:21.21]Let the magic warm the moonlit air
[01:25.25]Hear the choirs join in singing everywherе
[01:29.26]Hallelujah Hallelujah
[01:38.15]Ooh let there be peace on earth
[01:45.13]Let the lonely join together let them know their worth
[01:54.34]Ooh let the children know
[02:01.73]There's a brighter day ahead let's hold on to hope
[02:10.36]And on the coldest evening in this December
[02:18.73]Let us pray the spirit of love will linger
[02:25.33]Oh let the world stand still the church bells ring
[02:30.61]Silent night as the angels sing
[02:34.23]Hallelujah Hallelujah
[02:42.52]Let the magic warm the moonlit air
[02:46.52]Hear the choirs join in singing everywhere
[02:50.54]Hallelujah Hallelujah
[02:59.45]Glory glory glory I'm so glad to have you here
[03:06.37]And may this Christmas moment last for years
[03:15.10]Let the world stand still the church bells ring
[03:19.47]Silent night as the angels sing
[03:23.09]Hallelujah Hallelujah
[03:31.19]Let the magic warm the moonlit air
[03:35.29]Hear the choirs join in singing everywhere
[03:39.47]Hallelujah Hallelujah
[03:47.50]Hallelujah Hallelujah Hallelujah
[03:55.93]Hallelujah
[04:03.76]Hallelujah Hallelujah
[04:11.99]Hallelujah Hallelujah
data.trans:
[ti:Hallelujah]
[ar:Carrie Underwood/John Legend]
[al:My Gift]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.62]//
[00:11.24]//
[00:16.87]寒冷冬天
[00:23.84]让窗台上的烛光照亮黑夜
[00:33.10]我拥你入怀
[00:40.12]我们轻轻说着只有我们能听见的情话
[00:49.32]在这个十二月最冷的夜晚
[00:57.25]我在渐渐熄灭的火堆旁 紧紧拥抱着你
[01:04.84]让这世界静止不动 让教堂钟声响起
[01:09.30]寂静的夜里 天使歌唱着
[01:13.04]哈利路亚
[01:21.21]让魔法温暖月光下的寒冷空气
[01:25.25]唱诗班的歌声从四面八方传来
[01:29.26]哈利路亚
[01:38.15]让世界和平吧
[01:45.13]让孤独的人加入 让他们知道他们的珍贵之处
[01:54.34]让孩子们知道
[02:01.73]未来会更加美好 要心怀希望
[02:10.36]在这个十二月最冷的夜晚
[02:18.73]让我们祈祷爱的精神永存
[02:25.33]让这世界静止不动 让教堂钟声响起
[02:30.61]寂静的夜里 天使歌唱着
[02:34.23]哈利路亚
[02:42.52]让魔法温暖月光下的寒冷空气
[02:46.52]唱诗班的歌声从四面八方传来
[02:50.54]哈利路亚
[02:59.45]荣耀 我好高兴能有你在这里
[03:06.37]希望圣诞的欢乐时刻延续好多年
[03:15.10]让这世界静止不动 让教堂钟声响起
[03:19.47]寂静的夜里 天使歌唱着
[03:23.09]哈利路亚
[03:31.19]让魔法温暖月光下的寒冷空气
[03:35.29]唱诗班的歌声从四面八方传来
[03:39.47]哈利路亚
